token_info.name: Three Body Problem #018 - press Z to alter
token_info.description: I am trying to find interesting patterns among the chaos. Press X to explore new (previously unsold) seeds. Press Z to interfere/alter the simulation somehow. This is different with every objkt. Find the source code here https://github.com/atomoton/threebodyproblem/blob/master/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 to see any changes to the simulation or visualization code. All unsold burned after 24h without a sale.
